commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
import turtle as t
import random
from datetime import datetime, time

tim = t.Turtle()

colors = [
    "CornflowerBlue",
    "DarkOrchid",
    "IndianRed",
    "DeepSkyBlue",
    "LightSeaGreen",
    "wheat",
    "SlateGray",
    "SeaGreen",
]

directions

def draw_line():
    tim.color(random.choice(colors))
    tim.forward(100)
    tim.right(random.randint(0, 90, 180, 270))
    time.sleep(2000)


for _ in range(3, 900):
    draw_line()
